entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:36 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 10:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: SE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with rain before morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain or snow and ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
